div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1096 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1879 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: c. 40 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: 2B (as BMC 32-33) Disposition: dispersed â€ Liutsenko, p. 21 (also lists a few of other types which cannot belong) Prushevskaia, TONGE 1945, p. 23
